display_long_description:
Build Games & More 

Jump into an immersive social experience where you can create alongside friends from around the globe. Collaborate on your own games and design unique hangout spaces, all with easy-to-use tools! Creation in Rec Room is real-time, which means you can work together seamlessly to bring your ideas to life. 

Publish & Play – Instantly

Press ‘Publish’ and watch your creations go live across all devices, from VR to mobile - instantly available for a global audience to enjoy. Make an action-packed multiplayer PVP game, a spooky horror escape room, or just a chill place to hangout with friends.

Express Your Creativity With No Limits

From designing your avatar’s perfect outfit to customizing your own dorm room to 3D modeling and building entire games, there’s no limit to what you can create. Use Rec Room’s powerful in-game tools to bring your dream project to life. Level up your creation skills with simple tutorials so that you can create anything you want!

Create Anytime, Anywhere 

Rec Room gives you seamless cross-platform building — no pro skills or external software needed! Full voice-chat and cross-play make creating and playing with friends on different devices a breeze.  

Find Your Audience & Earn Rewards!

Showcase your work, monetize your creations, and grow a fanbase! Whether you're designing games, founding a club, hosting live events, or just hanging out with friends - Rec Room gives you the tools to turn creativity into endless possibilities.
